ED_Title: Participation of non-governmental organizations, civil society organizations, academic institutions and the private sector in the high-level meeting on the fight against tuberculosis
ED_DecisionText:
At its 94th plenary meeting, on 25 July 2023, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President,  (A/77/L.86.) recalling paragraph 10 of its resolution 77/274 of 24 February 2023 on the scope, modalities, format and organization of the high-level meeting on the fight against tuberculosis, decided to approve the participation of the non-governmental organizations, civil society organizations, academic institutions and the private sector listed in the annex to the present decision in the high-level meeting on the fight against tuberculosis to be held pursuant to resolution 77/274, including its panel discussions.
